Class javachart.chart.DAreaChart 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----javachart.chart.Chart
           |
           +----javachart.chart.AreaChart
                   |
                   +----javachart.chart.DAreaChart
public class DAreaChart
extends AreaChart
A DateAreaChart contains of 1 Area, 1 DateAxis for x values, and 1 StackAxis for y values.
See Also:
Area, DateAxis, StackAxis, Chart

DAreaChart()
constructs a default chart
DAreaChart(String)
constructs a default chart with the specified name
DAreaChart(String, Graphics)
constructs a default chart with the specified name and default Graphics class
